name: NSCompositingOperation
desc: Constants that describe compositing operators in terms of source and destination images, each having an opaque and transparent region.

items.name: case clear
items.desc: Transparency everywhere.

items.name: case copy
items.desc: The source image.

items.name: case sourceOver
items.desc: The source image wherever it is opaque, and the destination image elsewhere.

items.name: case sourceIn
items.desc: The source image wherever both images are opaque, and transparent elsewhere.

items.name: case sourceOut
items.desc: The source image wherever it is opaque and the destination image is transparent, and transparent elsewhere.

items.name: case sourceAtop
items.desc: The source image wherever both images are opaque, the destination image wherever it is opaque but the source image is transparent, and transparent elsewhere

items.name: case destinationOver
items.desc: The destination image wherever it is opaque, and the source image elsewhere.

items.name: case destinationIn
items.desc: The destination image wherever both images are opaque, and transparent elsewhere.

items.name: case destinationOut
items.desc: The destination image wherever it is opaque and the source image is transparent, and transparent elsewhere.

items.name: case destinationAtop
items.desc: The destination image wherever both images are opaque, the source image wherever it is opaque and the destination image is transparent, and transparent elsehwere.

items.name: case xor
items.desc: Exclusive OR of the source and destination images.

items.name: case plusDarker
items.desc: The sum of the source and destination images, with color values approach 0 as a limit.

items.name: case plusLighter
items.desc: The sum of the source and destination images, with color values approach 1 as a limit.

items.name: case multiply
items.desc: The source color is multiplied by the destination color.

items.name: case screen
items.desc: Multiplies the complement of the destination and source color values, and then complements the result.

items.name: case overlay
items.desc: Source colors overlay the destination.

items.name: case darken
items.desc: Use the darker of the source and destination colors.

items.name: case lighten
items.desc: Use the lighter of the source and destination colors.

items.name: case colorDodge
items.desc: Brightens the destination to reflect the source.

items.name: case colorBurn
items.desc: Darkens the destination color to reflect the source.

items.name: case softLight
items.desc: Darkens or lightens colors, with the effect of shining a diffused spotlight on the destination.

items.name: case hardLight
items.desc: Multiplies or screens colors, with the effect of shining a spotlight on the destination.

items.name: case difference
items.desc: Subtracts the darker value from the lighter value.

items.name: case exclusion
items.desc: Subtracts the darker value from the lighter value, except lower in contrast.

items.name: case hue
items.desc: Uses the hue of the source and the saturation and luminosity of the destination.

items.name: case saturation
items.desc: Uses the saturation value of the source and the hue and luminosity of the destination.

items.name: case color
items.desc: Uses the hue and saturation of the source and the luminosity of the destination.

items.name: case luminosity
items.desc: Uses the luminosity of the source and the hue and saturation of the destination.
